link:labelLink.link:label: Total of staff costs
Business names
Name of the reporting legal entity
Type of cash flow statement
The purpose of this concept is to express the method of the cash flow statement for this report. The options are "direct" or "indirect".
Explanation of resubmission of document due to technical and/or process-related inaccuracies
This concept provides reporters with the possibility to provide an explanation if, in rare circumstances to resubmit a new, corrected document due to technical and/or process-related inaccuracies.
Resubmission of the document due to technical and/or process-related inaccuracies (Y/N)
This concept provides reporters with the possibility in rare circumstances to resubmit a new, corrected document due to substantive and insurmountable inaccuracies.
Explanation of resubmission of the document due to substantive and insurmountable inaccuracies

This concept provides reporters with the possibility to provide an explanation if, in rare circumstances to resubmit a new, corrected document due to substantive and insurmountable inaccuracies in the facts of the report.
Resubmission of document due to substantive and insurmountable inaccuracies (Y/N)
This concept provides reporters with the possibility in rare circumstances to resubmit a new, corrected document due to substantive and insurmountable inaccuracies.
Type of income statement
Type of profit and loss account
Type of statement of income and expenses
The purpose of this concept is to express the model of the income statement for this report. The options are "nature of expense" or "function of expense".
